column1: Kata Robata////I can't believe I've never reviewed Kata Robata
column2: my family's main sushi destination. So
column3: the sushi here is very good
column4: but that's not really why it gets five stars from me. It's the consistency (Kata's stuff is *always* good) and the service (always well trained and efficient). The highs here aren't the same as elsewhere - see my review of a recent omakase in New York for examples - but I've also never had anything bad.
